beaunifi.name: Beaunifi
beaunifi.description: Smart beautify/minify server for JS and CSS with auto-detection. Use this when you need to read or edit minified JavaScript or CSS files. The server can detect if code is minified, beautify it for easier editing, and re-minify it when done. Workflow: 1) Use smart_process with action='read' to beautify minified code, 2) Edit the beautified code, 3) Use smart_process with action='write' to re-minify for production.
